captions.text: My planet is named as KMT184.05
After three months, I can go back to my planet.
If I can see you again,

In those pains,
I call you.

You`re my destiny. You are.
You`re my destiny. You are.

Looking at you
I call you silently.

You`re the one my love. You are.
You`re the one my love. You are.
Thing that never changes is my love to you.

You`re the one my love. You are.
You`re the one my love. You are.

Do you know me who love only you
even if the world changes?
Will there be a person resembling that much?

If this is not a dream,
I wish to see her again before I leave.

title: [MV] Lyn(린) _ My Destiny(My Love From the Star(별에서 온 그대)OST Part 1)

comments.text:
This drama and I Hear Your Voice have similarities, I'm not saying that 
there the same, just similarities like :
•The Diary thing 
•Both leading men want to protect the leading lady.
•Both villains want to kill the leading ladies bcoz of being and been in 
jail. 
•Leading men and leading ladies in both drama first saw each other so many 
years ago. 
•Both couple in both drama has an age gap but still deliver the chemistry 
perfectly. 
•Both drama is Amazing..!!!!! 
﻿

comments.author: Silvia Guerra

comments.text:
This is perhaps the best drama I have ever watched in my whole existence. 
Somehow this is different from other dramas I've watched. It left me empty, 
in both good ways and bad. It left me heartbroken, and it made me fckng cry 
2 days after I finished the drama (yes, two days after. You know the 
feeling when one night you drink alcohol too much but you didn't have the 
urge to puke on that night then two days later you didn't know you still 
have that hangover feel, so you puke). Yes, this was me. I cried 2 days 
*after* finishing the series because damn all the right feels are in there. 
All the emotions and stuff like *uggh* I just needed to let it out you 
know. ﻿
